thread.title: Charles Bronson’s ex Corrie actress fiancee says she’ll marry Britain’s most notorious criminal in prison chapel, hopes he’ll be released THIS YEAR – and reveals they’ve only met four times

author: elake
title: Charles Bronson’s ex Corrie actress fiancee says she’ll marry Britain’s most notorious criminal in prison chapel, hopes he’ll be released THIS YEAR – and reveals they’ve only met four times
text:
Opinion 'IT'S THE REAL DEAL' Charles Bronson’s ex Corrie actress fiancee says she’ll marry Britain’s most notorious criminal in prison chapel, hopes he’ll be released THIS YEAR – and reveals they’ve only met four times 
Con's fiancee insists 'he's a gentle giant and he's a gentleman he's very caring' by Emma Lake
